title: Ticket #3464: Send out gratuitous ARP at the beginning of Lark-enabled job
description: At the beginning of the job, we should send out a gratuitous ARP to force a refresh of the ARP tables on the switches in the broadcast domain. Only needed for bridge mode.
remarks:
2013-Mar-26 11:26:34 by bbockelm:
Done. We now send out gratuitous ARP for all topology changes.
check_ins:
2013-May-09 21:11   Check-in [46501]: Send ARP for Lark interface last. There appears to be a race condition where Linux will return the incorrect MAC address for the lark device if it is sent first. #3464 (By Brian Bockelman )
2013-Mar-26 11:22   Check-in [46466]: Send out gratuitous ARPs at the beginning and ending of the job. #3464 (By Brian Bockelman )
